title: Perfect Imperfection
description: I am faith.Behind my smile there is pain.Behind my eyes there are tears.I sit in a room full of people but I am lonely.You see me everyday taking my kids to school, shopping for groceries and going to work. I waited for my knight but he never came until I stopped waiting.Then one day he was in front of me trying to save me but he is too late, isnâ€™t he?
author: Rasha Riad
